There is an emotion called fear.
It is a very natural emotional reaction found in all animals.
There is the fear caused by animal instincts,
and the fear born of logical thought.
Namely, when you encounter something stronger than yourself
and realize that you have no way of facing it,
or when you encounter something unknown.
Something as simple as not knowing can evoke fear.
When faced with fear, you have a number of choices.
You might struggle, resist, flee, accept, or many other things.
But upon meeting Lord Dio, a new reaction arises...
How do people act once they feel joy in fear?
He is currently on the plane that Joestar and the others are on.
They will not reach their destination safely.
Are we already encountering another Stand user?
It could be a bug-shaped Stand.
It hid in the shadow of the seats...
It is on the side of your head!
It has to be a Stand.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
I have heard there is a user of a bug Stand that likes to rip out the tongues of its victims.
It is faster than Star Platinum, whose speed and precision
are such that it can grasp bullets.
It has to be a Stand.
Where is the one who is controlling it?!
Luckily, it could stop the spirit beetle's mouth needle with its teeth, but...
Since it tried to bite off Jotaro's Stand's tongue...

The one that depicts a Stand suggesting
Tower of Gray commits mass murders,
The airplane crash that happened last year
is thought to have been its work.
I had heard rumors, but it seems he is working with Dio!
but it also dodged a two-fisted rush of blows.
Even if you were to have ten guns shoot bullets from one centimeter away,
they would not be able to touch my Stand!
And you could not kill my Stand with a bullet anyway.
Where is the one controlling the Stand?
Which one of the passengers is he?
If we can track him down...
What is it planning to do?
This word's meaning: to kill everyone!
I will burn it to death!
I wonder what all the ruckus is...
I guess I will go to the bathroom.
We have to defeat it before the other passengers panic.
an active Stand like your Magician's Red
And Jojo, if your power were to put a hole in the fuselage, it would be a catastrophe.
Hierophant Green, is most suited to defeating it.
I have heard all about you from Lord Dio.
If you know that your Stand is quiet, there is no point in challenging me.
You cannot catch me with your speed.
You seem to think you can hit me if you fire enough shots,
but you have not hit me at all!
It is still dodging with its speed!
My speed is on an entirely different level.
You are way too slow to get a bingo.
With my next attack, I will stab your Stand's tongue with
this Tower Needle, and rip it out!
Once this rips your tongue out, you will go mad...
If its tongue is ripped out, it will go mad from the pain?
If it rips you apart, it will go mad, all right...
Hierophant's appendages had already slipped beneath the sheet.
Did not you realize I was trapping you there with Emerald Splash?
So that geezer was the user?
A repulsive Stand usually has a repulsive user.
It does not appear that he has Dio's flesh bud in his forehead...
From the start, Tower of Gray was an evil Stand that killed tourists,
making it look like an accident only in return for pay.
I am sure Dio was able to use him because he was
easily bought, and blinded by greed.
I could be imagining it, but it seems like the plane is flying crooked.
The cockpit is up ahead, so passengers may not enter.
It is inexcusable of him to treat women in such a cruel manner...
Their tongues have been ripped out.
He had already killed the pilots?
The autopilot's been destroyed, as well.
I am the Stand that holds The Tower card
which suggests accidents and the end of a journey.
You will not reach Lord Dio!
Even if you survive this crash, you are 10,000 kilometers from Egypt!
Those who swore loyalty to Lord Dio will pursue you every hour of every day!
There are Stands in this world that you cannot even imagine.
Lord Dio is the master of Stands!
Lord Dio has the power to reign over all of them.
There is no way you will reach him!
You bastards will never reach Egypt!
It is a good thing you did not scream.
Now, I have got a request.
This old man is now going to emergency land this plane on the water.
Go put life jackets and seat belts on all of the other passengers.
I have experience with propeller planes, but...
But, Jotaro... this is my third time.
Have you ever heard of someone being in a
I am never riding in a plane with you again.
The plane landed 35 kilometers off the Hong Kong coast.
Jotaro and the others had no choice but to head to Hong Kong.
Today, a jumbo jet made an emergency landing
35 kilometers south of Hong Kong, near Lamma Island.
Efforts are underway to rescue all passengers.
With more than 235 islands in the area,
the view of the area at night is known as the Million Dollar View.
Please make sure the only ones aboard are us and the crew.
We do not want any more victims.
If you are in Hong Kong, you got to try dim sum or rice porridge.
Unlike in Japan, rice porridge is a staple food in Hong Kong.
I will have it the popular way, with pork and a century egg.
What are you guys trying to eat?
We are going to go to my friend's shop.
Want to try some Hong Kong hot cola?
Everybody knows that cola's supposed to be cold.
Old man, who were you calling?
Oh, I will explain everything when we get to the shop.
We need to work out a plan that will get us to Egypt as safely and quickly as possible.
Mr. Joestar, we cannot allow any more innocent civilians to be hurt.
The quickest way would be by plane, but...
It is now become impossible for us to fly to Egypt.
If we encounter another Stand user like the last one on a commercial flight,
we are sure to cause a disaster that will harm many people.
We will have to get to Egypt by either land or sea.
But if we fail to meet Dio within fifty days...
If we had stayed on that plane,
we would probably be in Cairo by now.
But it is to soon to worry about it.
A hundred years ago, Jules Verne wrote a story in which
the protagonist traveled around the world
That was in the age of trains and steamboats.
Even without a plane, in fifty days,
we will be able to travel the 10,000 kilometers to Egypt.
We will charter a suitably-sized boat,
go around the Malay peninsula, and cross the Indian Ocean.
It will be the Silk Road of the sea.
I believe that is best, as well.
If we go by land, borders will be a hassle.
And we would have to cross the Himalayas and a desert.
If we ran into trouble, we would lose a great deal of time.
I have not been to any of those places using either route,
I will leave it up to you two.
the Stand users that Dio sends against us.
We will have to do our best to get to Egypt without being spotted.
This is a sign to let them know we want more tea.
If you do this in Hong Kong, they will bring you seconds.
Also, when they pour tea into your cup...
Excuse me, do you have a moment?
I am a tourist from France,
and I am having a hard time with the kanji on the menu.
Would you please help me out?
I have been to Hong Kong many times,
so I can at least read the kanji on the menu.
Why do not you join us?
So, what did you want to order?
Food with shrimp, duck, sharkfin, and mushrooms?
We will have this, this, this...
This looks like food with beef, fish, clams, and frog, but...
It does not matter what you order.
It is pretty good, is not it?
Well, they have certainly taken a lot of time to prepare this.
Someone I know has this exact mark on their neck...
My Stand holds The Chariot card!
Mohammed Avdol, it appears that you want to die first.
I have made a fire clock on that table!
I will kill you by the time that clock burns to twelve!
Would you like to be friends with me?
Stick with me, and it will disappear from your heart.
That left arm is not a right arm.
To think you are trying to use
fortune-telling to fight a fortune teller...
